00038 //the basic control class of all GUI objects
00039 
00040 class Control {
00041 public:
00042         Control(std::string, Window*, Control* = NULL, float = 0, float = 0);
00043         virtual ~Control();
00044 
00045         virtual void Activate(); //called when ever the control becomes active
00046 
00047         virtual bool HitTest(int, int);
00048 
00049         virtual void OnMousePress(unsigned short, int, int);
00050         virtual void OnMouseRelease(int);
00051         virtual void OnMouseEnter();
00052         virtual void OnMouseLeave();
00053         virtual bool OnMouseClick(unsigned short, bool);
00054 
00055         virtual void OnKeyPress(unsigned short);
00056         virtual void OnKeyRelease(int, int);
00057 
00058         virtual void Move(float, float);
00059         virtual void SetCallback(boost::function<void()>);
00060         virtual void SetWidth(float);
00061         virtual void SetHeight(float);
00062         virtual bool HasAttrib(unsigned short);
00063         virtual void SetEnabled(bool);
00064         virtual void SetFocus(bool);
00065 
00066         virtual void SetColor(float, float, float, float);
00067         virtual void SetColor(nv::vec4<float>);
00068         virtual void AddColor(nv::vec4<float>);
00069         virtual float* GetColorv();
00070 
00071         virtual void AddChild(Control*);
00072         virtual Control* GetChild(unsigned int);
00073         virtual Control* IterateChild(unsigned int);
00074         virtual int IterateChild(Control*);
00075 
00076         virtual unsigned int Size();
00077         virtual unsigned int TotalChildren();
00078         virtual unsigned int NumChildren();
00079 
00080 
00081         virtual float GetWidth();
00082         virtual float GetHeight();
00083 
00084         virtual bool IsRoot();
00085         virtual bool IsLeaf();
00086 
00087         float Width, Height;
00088         float x, y;
00089         float s, t, s2, t2;
00090 protected:
00091         unsigned short Attributes;
00092         Window* Root;
00093         Control* Parent;
00094         Control* MouseOverChild;
00095         Control* ActiveChild;
00096         std::vector<Control*> Children;
00097         boost::function<void() > m_Callback;
00098 private:
00099         void GetControlData();
00100 
00101         bool hasFocus, isEnabled;
00102         nv::vec4<float> Color;
00103 
00104         std::string Type;
00105 };
